## VFS.isParentOf() method

Determine whether parentPath is parent directory of path (includes the case where parentPath is same as path)

**Signature:**

```typescript
isParentOf(parentPath: string, path: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

parentPath


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The possible parent path


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

path


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The possible child path


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

true if parentPath is parent directory of path or parent directory is same as path
